hero.subtitle: Create AI scouts that continuously search and notify you when they find what you're looking for

placeholders: Scout for Taylor Swift tickets in my city...
Tell me when Mr. Beast comes to my city...
Scout for new Chinese restaurants near me...
Scout for Tesla Cybertruck available for test drive...
Scout for cheap flights to Tokyo next month...
Scout for PS5 restocks at local stores...

alerts.checkLimitError: Error checking scout limit. Please try again.
alerts.limitReached: You have reached the maximum limit of 5 scouts. Please delete an existing scout to create a new one.

recentDiscoveries.descriptionPreview: This is what discoveries will look like once your scouts find something.
recentDiscoveries.descriptionLive: Real-time findings from scouts around the world.
recentDiscoveries.cta: Create your first scout to start receiving discoveries

howItWorks.description: Create powerful AI scouts that work around the clock to find exactly what you're looking for.

card.title: AI-powered configuration
card.subtitle: Chat to configure
card.line1: Tell our AI assistant what you want to scout.
card.line2: It will help you set up the perfect search criteria.

alwaysSearching.description: Your scouts work 24/7 in the background, searching the web and notifying you the moment they find a match.

card.title: Continuous scouting
card.subtitle: Always searching
card.line1: Your scout runs automatically in the background,
card.line2: searching and notifying you of new matches.

input.placeholderDescribe: Describe what you want to scout...

response.intro2: scout, I need a few details:
response.questionBudget: And what's your maximum budget per ticket?
